title: Applications for admission of Grade 1 students in govt schools
body_lines: The Ministry of Education says that the applications forms to enroll students to Grade One in government schools for the year 2023 have been published online.
Accordingly, the applications and guidelines can be obtained from the ministry’s website (www.moe.gov.lk).
The ministry says that closing date for applications is July 16, 2022.
Application Form - Sinhala - 2023 by Adaderana Online on Scribd
